reviews.title: For those having trouble
reviews.review_text: If you are having trouble connecting the airpod to your current case leave them in the case for 30 min AFTER unpairing the original airpods from the phone. After some time open and press the back button of the case until the white color appears. Connect the case to your phone and it will work.
Very happy - was done to only the right side didnt know you could get a refurbished left side! Works great!

reviews.title: Good as new
reviews.review_text: It's the real deal. Opened it up and synced it up immediately. Worked like a new one right out of the box.

reviews.title: Not good.
reviews.review_text: I thought I ordered a pair. As in 2. A left n right. But I paid $35 for just a left AirPod had i known I would've only gotten 1 (ONE!!! ) AirPod I would've saved my money n get nothing at all. I thought it was strange that it was only 35$ but now imma send it back and I want my money back. Waste of time and money. I didn't even check it to see if it worked, only unfolded it to get them out. But when I saw it was only 1 single pod I rolled it back up and put it back in its packaging.

Save your money and shop elsewhere.
The airpod itself makes little to no sound even if the airpod balance is all the way to the left, total scam and would not recommend to anyone.

I was ready to order new AirPods since I loat the left AirPod two months ago. Luckily, I found out here in this app that you can buy just one side. I like that they send you instructions how to go about adding just one side of the AirPods to the current saved setting.

reviews.title: Great replacement AirPod!
reviews.review_text: My daughter lost one of her AirPods months ago, and she wanted a brand new set, I suggested a replacement. Initially she was TOTALLY against the idea, thinking it would be dirty or not work as well, but I talked her into it. I tried the Apple Store first, and one AirPod replacement was the same price as a brand new set!! We did a quick search and Walmart popped up. As always ordering was a painless simple process, and was delivered on time for Christmas. The AirPod arrived in decent packaging, bubble wrap and easy to read/comprehend, instructions. The AirPod was beyond clean, not a speck of dirt on it, and is in like new condition not marred or scratched at all. Took no time at all to connect to her original AirPod case and her phone, no issues whatsoever. My daughter was very pleased!!! Lastly, you can't beat the price for the quality of an expensive Apple product.

reviews.title: Nope! Not again!
reviews.review_text: I ordered a left AirPod as my original one stopped emitting sound. I didn't know that item that I had ordered was refurbished. I tried to pair it and it was not sync even using the instructions provided. Never again will I go through a third-party seller. And no more refurbished items.

reviews.title: Don't spend your money!!
reviews.review_text: I purchased the left AirPod replacement and it would connect I followed all of the directions provided in the package. I even let it charge over night hoping for a better out come. Nope nothing. I have called the company several times no answer and no call back. I even emailed them and no reply except the automated reply telling me the same thing about how to connect the AirPod. I will be returning the item and going to Apple for my replacement!!!
